Today marks my own personal “hell day.” It seems that everything is due today – test corrections, homework problems, and a nice long feasibility report. To make matters worse, I put everything off until yesterday. I will blame this partially on the fact that I worked all day Saturday and had chapter for nine hours on Sunday. Despite getting only four hours of sleep last night, I am excited – why? Because I’m almost DONE. That’s right, after today its smooth sailing clear to Friday. What is Friday? Well, my friend, the Friday is the first day of spring break!

Unfortunately, it would appear that at the current moment I will be spending the week in good ole’ Macon, just as I have done every other spring break, working to fund the rest of the semester. Whatever. I work 9am – 6pm so my evenings are free. If you’re around, give me a call and we’ll hang out.
